HeadComp.title: Customer knowledgebase platform by MSG91-Spain
HeadComp.description: Provide customers with a centralized knowledge base for instant access to answers about your products and services. Improve convenience and satisfaction.

BannerComp.heading: Knowledge base is the backbone for good customer support
BannerComp.subheading: Get all essential features of KnowledgeBase software at nominal price

features.name: WYSIWYG editor
features.content: Easily create or edit your knowledge base articles Quickly create your articles with the what you see is what you get content editor. It is as simple to use as if you were using a Word Processor or HTML Editor.

features.name: SEO friendly (Subfolder and subdomain both support)
features.content: An SEO-friendly optimized knowledge base Your knowledge base is run on your own domain and not on any subdomain so the algorithms treat it as your website giving it the same importance as your other webpages.

features.name: Whitelabel
features.content: It works on your branding and not ours Your users view your knowledge base under your branding on your website. Our whitelabel services ensure thereâ€™s no indication of it being powered by MSG91.

PreFooterComp.content: Start building your ideal customer engagement experience
